name: Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore
storyline:
Welcome to the top-secret world of Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore, where the stakes are high and animals aren't what they seem!

Innocent house pets engage in covert missions with high-tech gadgets - and humans are none the wiser. It would take quite a catastrophe for the rival forces of cats and dogs to work together, but that's exactly what's happened: the evil mastermind Kitty Galore has concocted a doomsday device and must be stopped!

Three different animals - Diggs the rookie dog from Canine Special Forces, Catherine the beautiful feline agent, and Seamus the streetwise pigeon - will have to cooperate through death-defying missions to defeat Kitty Galore and her legions of henchcats. These unlikely heroes must use each of their unique abilities to overcome the challenges ahead.

Who ever said saving the world was easy?
summary: In Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore, players fight Kitty Galore's agents of evil to save the day and send the bad guys packing. Players will have to utilize their animalistic acrobatics and AI "Animal Intelligence" to make their way through various levels and obstacles and collect critical items and power-ups, which will unlock new areas as they progress through the game. They will also be challenged by a number of covert missions including helping stool pigeons carry out their air-based special operations and destroying Kitty Galore's treacherous equipment. Featuring six different mission types, including escort, stealth and combat, the game promises to deliver on all the excitement of the film, leading to the big showdown with Kitty Galore.
